Functions

00200_TEE_GetPropertyAsBool
[GP_010_Properties]

Functions

 TestCase_GC0001_AllBooleans ()
 TestCase_BC002_NonBooleans ()
 TestCase_BC003_nameUnknown ()
 TestCase_BC004_nameNull ()
 TestCase_BC005_bufferNull ()
 TestCase_GC007_Bool_boundaryStress ()

Detailed Description

Description:
: This test intends to verify the behavior of TA properties APIs for Getting a Property as Boolean.

TEE_Result TEE_GetPropertyAsBool( TEE_PropSetHandle propsetOrEnumerator, [instringopt] char* name, [out] bool* value );

For this test, we will need at least one TA.

Enumeration is not performed in this test.

Pre: Open a session to a GPTA.

Post: Close session and check that it succeeds.

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC0001_AllBooleans (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05040000000000000000000000000001 6b28a6d436fe5fb9b5ed59cba151a0fc
Pre Conditions:
05040000000000000000000000000001.[drbin/tlbin] is loaded.
Focus:
Verify that a boolean property can be correctly retrieved. Also verify all required boolean properties.
Test Steps:
For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT get "gpd.ta.singleInstance" should return a boolean value of TRUE and TEE_SUCCESS For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT get "gpd.ta.multiSession" should return a boolean value of FALSE and TEE_SUCCESS For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT get "gpd.ta.instanceKeepAlive" should return a boolean value FALSE and TEE_SUCCESS For TEE_PROPSET_TEE_IMPLEMENTATION get "gpd.tee.cryptography.ecc" should return a boolean value TRUE and TEE_SUCCESS
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No

TestCase_GC007_Bool_boundaryStress (  )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
05040000000000000000000000000001 6b28a6d436fe5fb9b5ed59cba151a0fc
Pre Conditions:
05040000000000000000000000000001.[drbin/tlbin] is loaded.
Focus:
Verify that an Bool property can be correctly retrieved and that it does not overlap on either side of the destination variable.
Test Steps:
Allocate a buffer 8x the size needed to represent the Bool used for this test for 1 to 16: fill the buffer with random data, and make a copy of it for comparison later randomly choose an offset of from 0 to size of a Bool * 4 (aligned on 1 byte) set the output pointer to the output variable + offset For TEE_PROPSET_CURRENT_CLIENT get "gpd.ta.singleInstance" should return a boolean value of TRUE and TEE_SUCCESS Check that all data before the output portion of the buffer did not change Check that all data after the output portion of the buffer did not change
Post Conditions:
none
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
